content: wrist computer cushion by rachel levine materials needed 1 once worsted weight yarn i used caron s one ponder 100% acrylic this is a great stash buster i 5 5mm hook yarn needle scissors fiberfill optional size unfolded 2 ½ inches x 11 inches folded and stuffed 2 ½ inches x 5 ½ inches gauge 4 x 4 single_crochet square using i hook 12 stitches 14 row make sure that you check your gauge before starting this project chain 40 for a larger version chain 60 th row 1 double_crochet from 4 chain in across chain 1 turn nd row 2-6 single_crochet from 2 st in across chain 3 turn row 7 repeat row 1 finish off notes for the larger version work through the pattern twice sewing optional as it can be left flat if you wish with wrong sides on the outside while folded horizontally whip stitch all the way round until about ¾ a way shut flip so that the right side is now on the outside fill with the fiberfill then sew what you left open note if you decide to fill it you may want to put fabric behind all the row before whip stitching and stuffing otherwise the fiberfill will show through thanks to my pattern testers on crochetville for testing this pattern
